Astronomer CEO Scandal
coldplay fan trolls him at next show
... 'He's Not My CEO'
1
shares
By
TMZ Staff
Published
July 20, 2025 5:38 AM PDT
Getty/X/@world_coldplay Composite
Coldplay's tour isn't just making headlines for the music anymore -- it's still riding the wave of the scandal that started with one very public cuddle.
Hace un momento se pudo apreciar este cartel en concierto de Coldplay en Madison. "He's not my ceo" "Él no es mi director ejecutivo" 😅
#ColdplayMadison
#Coldplay
pic.twitter.com/o0LlpPweIL
— Coldplay World (@world_coldplay)
July 20, 2025
@world_coldplay
At Coldplay's Madison, Wisconsin concert Saturday night -- the band’s first show since that kiss cam moment last week -- one fan held up a sign that had the entire crowd laughing. The sign read, "He's not my CEO," complete with an arrow pointing to the man beside her.
Play video content
CONCERT CATASTROPHE
TMZ.com
The cheeky placard was a clear nod to the scandal involving former Astronomer CEO
Andy Byron
and
the
company's head of HR,
Kristin Cabot
, who went viral last week after being caught on the venue's kiss cam in an intimate moment at Coldplay's Massachusetts concert.
Keep Reading
'summer house' stars
recreate viral coldplay kiss cam scandal 😘
By
TMZ Staff
Published
July 20, 2025 5:54 AM PDT
TikTok/@westywilson/Storyful Composite
The "Summer House" crew is getting in on the viral kiss cam chaos that's had the internet talking all week -- and they're doing it with a heavy dose of humor.
Bravo stars
Kyle Cooke
,
Carl Radke
and
Jesse Solomon
, took to TikTok over the weekend to poke fun at the now-infamous moment former Astronomer CEO
Andy Byron
was caught on the Coldplay concert kiss cam with
Kristin Cabot
, the company's head of HR. The viral moment, which exploded online last week, showed the pair in a cozy embrace at the band's Massachusetts show.
Waiting for your permission to load TikTok Post.
The video recreates the scandalous scene in which you see Carl wrap his arms around Kyle while
Chris Martin
's voice plays in the background. The two pretend to panic as if they've just realized they're being

Margot Robbie & Tom Ackerley
Lots of Amore in Naples ...
Loved-Up Balcony Snaps!!!
285
shares
By
TMZ Staff
Published
July 19, 2025 2:26 PM PDT
|
Updated
July 19, 2025 5:36 PM PDT
Gallery
Launch Gallery
Romantico!
Launch Gallery
Gallery
COBRA TEAM / BACKGRID
Margot Robbie
and her man
Tom Ackerley
are living it up in one of the most romantic countries in the world ... saying "ciao" to a lovely new day while cuddling up on their Italian balcony.
The actor and her producer husband were spotted in Naples Friday ... with Margot sipping on what looks like water -- and Tom drinking in Margot's beauty, wrapping his arms around her midriff and giving her a peck on her head.
COBRA TEAM / BACKGRID
Margot's looking elegant in a flower ensemble that shows off her long legs ... while Ackerley's keeping it casual in a loose-fitting button-down and a very nice watch.
Keep Reading
'Memba When
This Boxing Champ Ran Into A Fan?
63
shares
By
TMZ Staff
Published
July 19, 2025 12:00 PM PDT
Play video content
2007
TMZ THROWBACK!!!
TMZ.com
Boxers tend to be big draws on fight nights ... and they're even bigger draws when their fans see them in public!
We caught this world-champion pugilist back in 2007, when one of his supporters ran into him at a gas station, and he even got her to tell his girlfriend about what a knockout he is!
Even though he looked like he was enjoying his night on the town, this guy's stayed pretty busy over the past few years ... just ask
Jake Paul
, whom he fought -- and lost to -- in 2024!

Michigan
'Hawk Tuah' Boat for Sale ... No Lowballing!!!
Spitting Distance From Water
Exclusive
161
shares
By
TMZ Staff
Published
July 18, 2025 4:13 PM PDT
Getty Composite
The "Hawk Tuah" phenomenon seemed inescapable across the country last year ... and now we know it was even penetrating the water as well, thanks to a vessel currently for sale christened with the viral TikTok phrase.
Rob Worth
, 52, a software developer in Alpena, Michigan, tells TMZ ... he's listed his 1996 Tempest 152 -- dubbed "Hawk Tuah" -- for $4,200.
Gallery
Launch Gallery
For $ale!
Launch Gallery
Gallery
Rob Worth
The boat has been on sale for about two weeks ... and RW tells us he has been entertaining offers -- but so far, they have been lowballing him.
Keep Reading
Robbie Pardlo
'City High' Singer Dead At 46
Exclusive
4.4K
shares
By
TMZ Staff
Published
July 18, 2025 2:54 PM PDT
|
Updated
July 18, 2025 4:00 PM PDT
Getty
Robbie Pardlo
, lead singer of the Grammy-nominated R&B group
City High
, has tragically died at the age of 46, a rep for the singer confirms to TMZ.
Robbie passed away yesterday, July 17, surrounded by his family and close friends in Willingboro, NJ ... leaving behind a lengthy musical legacy.
Getty
No cause of death has been determined yet ... the family is currently grieving but will be planning Robbie's memorial services and tributes in the upcoming days and will share details with the public.
Keep Reading
Guess The
Sexy Star In This
White-Hot Bikini!
81
shares
By
TMZ Staff
Published
July 18, 2025 4:34 PM PDT
Gallery
Launch Gallery
Guess Who!
Launch Gallery
Gallery
Feel good this Friday with this fun game of Guess Who! Can you guess which Hollywood hottie put her rockin' bod on full display in this eye-popping shot?!
She's a New York-based model and influencer who's worked for big brands like Ralph Lauren and SKIMS. She also made her Sports Illustrated Swimsuit Rookie debut in 2022.
Need one more hint? Just ask her rumored boyfriend,
Joe Burrow
.
Hit up the gallery and see who's owning this white-hot bikini!
